name: EVaiL
description: "EVaiL" is a 2D story game. You are a normal citizen, going to work everyday, checking your mails with Siri, controlling your music with Alexa, let Bixbi read your kids good night stories... But something is changing. You don't remember you told Siri that you have an apointment at the dentist tomorrow. And the guy from this old-school radio technology thingy yells about the "technological revolution". Is it time to rethink your attitude?
